```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

# importing the ezids package
library(ezids)

# importing ggplot2 for graphs
library(ggplot2)
```

# Brain Stroke Prediction

```{r, results=TRUE}
stroke_df <- data.frame(read.csv("healthcare-dataset-stroke-data.csv"))
str(stroke_df)
xkabledplyhead(stroke_df)
```

```{r, results=TRUE}
# Getting the summary of the  dataset
xkablesummary(stroke_df)
```
Creating a subset to do my part of EDA which includes the columns hypertension, and heart_disease

```{r results=TRUE}
stroke_subset <- subset(stroke_df, select=c("hypertension", "heart_disease", "stroke"))
xkabledplyhead(stroke_subset)
```

```{r}
tab2 = table(stroke_df$hypertension, stroke_df$stroke)
names(dimnames(tab2))<- c("Hypertension", "Stroke")
tab2
```

```{r}
ggplot(stroke_subset, aes(x = stroke, y = hypertension)) + ggtitle("")+ geom_point()
```

```{r, include=TRUE}
ht_plot <- ggplot(data = stroke_subset, aes(hypertension, fill=hypertension))+geom_bar()
ht_plot

hd_plot <- ggplot(data = stroke_subset, aes(heart_disease, fill=heart_disease))+geom_bar()
hd_plot
```
